name: Banana Bread

ingredients: 2 cups Pillsbury's Best All Purpose or Unbleached Flour

directions: In large bowl, blend first 7 ingredients; beat 1 minute at medium speed.
Stir in remaining ingredients just until dry ingredients are moistened. Pour batter into prepared pan.
Grease (not oil) bottom only of 9x5 or 8.4 inch loaf pan (metal works much better than glass).
Backe at 350 degrees for 60 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.
Cool 5 minutes and remove from pan. Cool completely.
